shinycoreci 0.0.0.9005
  • Reference

Install direct shinycoreci dependencies

install_exact_shinycoreci_deps.Rd

If something goes wrong, default to installing shinycoreci from GitHub. Then try installing the dependencies again. See the examples.

install_exact_shinycoreci_deps(
  dir = "apps",
  apps = apps_runtests(dir),
  try_again = TRUE,
  assert = interactive()
)

Arguments

dir

base folder to look for applications
apps

applications within dir to run
try_again

Logical to determine if RStudio IDE should try again after a failure
assert

Logical to determine if an error should be thrown or RStudio should be restarted

Examples

if (FALSE) remotes::install_github("rstudio/shinycoreci")
shinycoreci::install_exact_shinycoreci_deps("apps")
